text: Then I came round the corner of the island and walked briskly towards him.

passages.fragment: Then I came round the corner of
passages.full_quote: <used>Then I came round the corner of</used> a bush

passages.fragment: round the corner of the island and
passages.full_quote: We had a dreary morning's work before us, for there was no sign of any wind, and the boats had to be got out and manned, and the ship warped three or four miles <used>round the corner of the island and</used> up the narrow passage to the haven behind Skeleton Island

passages.fragment: of the island and walked briskly towards him
passages.full_quote: As soon as I remembered I was not defenceless, courage glowed again in my heart and I set my face resolutely for this man <used>of the island and walked briskly towards him</used>
